verbs.description: The FBI [V: is] reportedly investigating a $ 150,000 payment Trump lawyer Michael Cohen received last November from an aerospace company in South Korea .
[ARG0: The FBI] is [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: investigating] [ARG1: a $ 150,000 payment Trump lawyer Michael Cohen received last November from an aerospace company in South Korea] .
The FBI is reportedly investigating [ARG1: a $ 150,000 payment] [ARG0: Trump lawyer Michael Cohen] [V: received] [ARGM-TMP: last November] [ARG2: from an aerospace company in South Korea] .
